Constructor Detail

CGoogleSitesProvider

public CGoogleSitesProvider(java.lang.String vault_path,
                            java.lang.String vault_name)
Create an unauthenticated provider. The provider will still need to obtain authorization tokens in order to actually store files to storage.

Parameters:
vault_path - is the path of the filecabinet where uploaded files will be placed.
vault_name - is the page name of the filecabinet
See Also:
setAuthorizationCode(String,IProgressMonitor)
Method Detail

getAuthorizationURL

public java.net.URL getAuthorizationURL()
Returns:
a URL where you can send the user to start an OAuth authorization dance.

setAuthorizationCode

public void setAuthorizationCode(java.lang.String code,
                                 IProgressMonitor mon)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Set an authcode that is sent after the user visits the authorization url and approves app access. You will still need to select a domain before the provider is fully initialized, using the getSiteList() and useSite() methods.

Parameters:
code - sent over by google.
mon - can monitor the progress of the request.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
getAuthorizationURL(), getSiteList(org.thormor.provider.IProgressMonitor), useSite(org.thormor.provider.remote.googlesites.CSiteInfo, org.thormor.provider.IProgressMonitor)

getSiteList

public java.util.List<CSiteInfo> getSiteList(IProgressMonitor mon)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Return a list of domains that the user has created.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

useSite

public void useSite(CSiteInfo info,
                    IProgressMonitor mon)
             throws java.io.IOException
Use this site to host the vault. This will also create a file cabinet called "Thormor Vault" on the site.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

postUnlockHook

public void postUnlockHook(CVault vault)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: IRemoteProvider
The vault calls this method every time it is unlocked. This is an opportunity to save or read secured access tokens and so on.

download

public IRemoteProvider.DownloadStatus download(CDownloadInfo info,
                                               IProgressMonitor mon)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: IRemoteProvider
Download a remote file, updating the monitor as the download proceeds. You can update the last_modified and etag value in the info parameter if necessary, for use in subsequent requests.

Specified by:
download in interface IRemoteProvider
Parameters:
info - data about file to be downloaded
mon - if not null, update with upload progress.

java.io.IOException

hasCredentials

public boolean hasCredentials()
Returns:
true if the provider has obtained user credentials and has selected a domain for the vault.
